name: NiGTHS Flight Range
description:
What is this?

An attempt to recreate parts of NiGHTS gameplay such as the flight and taking in nice sceneries to then make it playable to the public!!

Why?

Seeing as I'm not working for SEGA and that SEGA has not made a NiGHTS game which I always feel like I'm in the need of for a long time, I took it upon myself to try to re-create as much as I can from the old NiGHTS stuff we have with my limited 3D knowledge (as also an attempt to improve my 3D skills :))

How is this done?

This is done through:

  • Unity
  • Experience with the NiGHTS franchise
  • 3D Models Available Online
  • 3D Modeling Software to create 3D models and enhance imported models
  • Audacity to improve audio quality and do necessary changes like loops
  • Cinemamachine to direct NiGHTS' movement
  • Coding! Coding using C#!! A lot of coding using C#!!!
  • Passion for SEGA games and the NiGHTS franchise :)
Full-on fangame?

Probably not because I'm currently working on my own game while balancing university duties among others

And the fact that my 3D knowledge isn't nowhere near ready stunning visuals :(
